text: Kocaeli University is a university in Turkey. It is in İzmit, Kocaeli. The university has many campuses in Umuttepe, Anıtpark and other places. It is a public university. == Faculties == * Engineering * Medicine * Law * Dentistry * Architecture and Design * Education * Arts and Sciences * Fine Arts * Communication * Technology * Economics and Administrative Sciences * State Conservatory Category:Colleges and universities in Turkey Category:Kocaeli Province
title: Kocaeli University
